document.full_text: roger federer was blown away 6-4 6-4 by juergen melzer in the monte carlo masters quarter-finals but rafa nadal stormed through as the gap between the two great rivals widened further friday.
document.title: melzer puts wind up beaten federer as nadal wins
lines_and_colors: roger federer was blown away 6-4 6-4 by juergen melzer in the monte carlo masters quarter-finals but rafa nadal stormed through as the gap between the two great rivals widened further friday.
